sentences.english: The effect of estrogens on fibrocystic breast disease (FBD) are controversial.
sentences.chinese: 雌激素对乳腺纤维囊性增生病的影响各家报道不一。

sentences.english: Pregnancy and estrogen-based medications can cause cavernous hemangiomas to grow.
sentences.chinese: 妊娠和雌激素药物可能导致的海绵状血管瘤增长。

sentences.english: Soy isoflavones are known to be estrogenic.
sentences.chinese: 已知大豆异黄酮为雌激素。

sentences.english: Abstract The cardioprotective effects of estrogen are mediated by receptors expressed in vascular cells.
sentences.chinese: 雌激素心血管效应是由心血管细胞表达的受体介导的。

sentences.english: After that, she is put on the anti-estrogen Tamoxifen for five years.
sentences.chinese: 之后，她服用抗雌激素的三苯氧胺长达五年。

sentences.english: Conclusion The Niaochangshu capsule has the estrin type function.
sentences.chinese: 结论尿畅舒胶囊具有雌激素样作用。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To improve the preparation of estrogen 3-methyl ether.
sentences.chinese: 目的改进雌激素类化合物3位酚羟基的甲醚化工艺。

sentences.english: Main side effects were digestive tract symptom and anti-estrogen effect.
sentences.chinese: 不良反应较少，主要为消化道症状及抗雌激素反应。

sentences.english: The binding site of diethylstilbestrol may be oestrogen receptor on sperm surface.
sentences.chinese: 乙烯雌酚作用部位可能与精子雌激素受体有关。

sentences.english: The whole concept of estrogen replacement therapy was about that.
sentences.chinese: 雌激素替代疗法的整个概念就是针对它的。

sentences.english: For the first time, phytoestrogen values were assigned to animal products.
sentences.chinese: 植物雌激素值首次被归到动物产品中。

sentences.english: Unlike combination birth control pills, the minipill doesn't contain estrogen.
sentences.chinese: 与复合避孕丸不同的是，迷你避孕丸不含雌激素。

sentences.english: They might be due to increases in estrogen levels, which peak around the time of ovulation.
sentences.chinese: 可能是由于雌激素水平上升，排卵期前后达到高峰。

sentences.english: Objective To study estrogens' action in treating urethra infection in old woman.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究雌激素对老年妇女尿路感染的治疗作用。

sentences.english: To some degree, estrogen reduces the effect of androgens in women.
sentences.chinese: 某种程度上雌激素降低了雄激素的对女性的影响。

sentences.english: We can think these changes concerned with the function of estrin.
sentences.chinese: 可以认为这些改变与雌激素的作用有关。

definition: testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]
corpus luteum (glands in female mammals producing progesterone)
thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
testosterone/abbr. for 睾丸甾酮[gao1 wan2 zai1 tong2]
